name: D-VOX (beta 4)
description: This is a VOX (audio) WAD containing MP3 sound clips recorded by Jac0b and AF-Domains.net which replace the standard announcements heard while playing ZDaemon (a ZDoom port). Duel, FFA, DDOM, and CTF modes are supported. This is a beta3 version for testing. Send feedback to indigo223@gmail.com.
